val:
Finding a starting point when you're trying to learn NodeJS from scratch is really hard. I had the same problem and I combed through the internet in search of a learning resource when I first dipped my toes in Nodeland.

Here are all of the quality Node learning resources I found during my quest for mastering NodeJS as a beginner.

Documentations

  • Express/Node introduction | MDN
  • Full Stack Open
  • Introduction to Node.js
  • NodeJS | The Odin Project
  • Node.js Tutorial | W3Schools
  • NodeJS Tutorial | TutorialsPoint
  • Documentation | NodeJS
  • NodeSchool

YouTube Tutorials

  • Node JS Tutorial for Beginners | The Net Ninja
  • Node.js Tutorial for Beginners: Learn Node in 1 Hour | Mosh
  • Node.js Crash Course | Brad Traversy
  • Node.js Ultimate Beginnerâ€™s Guide in 7 Easy Steps | Fireship
  • Learn Node.js - Full Tutorial for Beginners | FreeCodeCamp
  • Node.js Crash Course Tutorial (2020) | The Net Ninja

Paid Courses

  • The Complete Node.js Developer Course (3rd Edition) | Andrew Mead
  • Learn Node | Wes Bos
